domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Surgeon_General @WhiteHouse During this whole debacle of the #JeromeAdams during #COVID19 press conferences, I’ve been tempted & avoided calling him an #UncleTom. This sanctimonious dumb fuck is so far removed from his community. How dare he have the nerve to judge, degrade & preach to a full race. #Asshole
